page.title: 09HOUSING
page.content: To find out about {housing}in our area we went out of school in groups to draw a plan of the area. We went down each road and drew all of the houses onto paper, marking down the number and types of houses. The first thing we found was that there were really four types of houses in the area - 1. pre/post war 1920-1950 2. chalet style 1960's 3. palin fronted1960's 4. bungalows ranging from old to new. Most of the pre and post war houses were nearest to the Hinckley Road and around Ravenhurs School. The newer houses were built around Millfield and Stafford Leys schools, and were built when new jobs were created in Leicester.
